titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the depreciation of property used in the generation of electricity.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/10/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the accelerated cost recovery system, to: (1) add property used in the generation of electricity to the definition of seven-year property; and (2) with respect to the special rules for determining class life, deem such property to have a ten-year class life.
